div.div: Sort by: Popularity▲ | Alphabetical | IMDb Rating | Number of Votes | Runtime | Year | Release Date | Your Rating | Date of Your Rating

div.title: Users rated this 6.9/10 (3,029 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: In an alternative Victorian Age Gotham City, Batman begins his war on crime while he investigates a new series of murders by Jack the Ripper.
Director: Sam Liu | Stars: Bruce Greenwood, Jennifer Carpenter, Chris Cox, John DiMaggio
Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) is left to care for Jack-Jack while Helen (Elastigirl) is out saving the world.
Director: Brad Bird | Stars: Jonathan Banks, Samuel L. Jackson, Catherine Keener, Sophia Bush

div.title: Users rated this 8/10 (533,618 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

h3.a: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie

div.title: Users rated this 6.2/10 (16,210 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: Two overly imaginative pranksters named George and Harold hypnotize their principal into thinking he's a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.
Director: David Soren | Stars: Kevin Hart, Thomas Middleditch, Ed Helms, Nick Kroll

div.title: Users rated this 9.2/10 (162,110 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: In a war-torn world of elemental magic, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar, and bring peace to the world.
Stars: Dee Bradley Baker, Zach Tyler, Mae Whitman, Jack De Sena
Plot kept under wraps.
Directors: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman | Stars: Liev Schreiber, Mahershala Ali, Brian Tyree Henry, Shameik Moore

div.title: Users rated this 7.3/10 (93,918 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.

div.title: Users rated this 6/10 (11,031 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: Shunned by everyone for being the son of an evil warlord, a teenager seeks to defeat him with the help of his fellow ninjas.

div.title: Users rated this 8.7/10 (22,562 votes) - click stars to rate

div.title: Users rated this 7.8/10 (330,491 votes) - click stars to rate

div.title: Users rated this 7.8/10 (280,855 votes) - click stars to rate

div.title: Users rated this 4.8/10 (10,665 votes) - click stars to rate

div.title: Users rated this 8.7/10 (91,909 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: After learning that he is from another planet, a warrior named Goku and his friends are prompted to defend it from an onslaught of extraterrestrial enemies.

div.title: Users rated this 9/10 (64,856 votes) - click stars to rate

Stars: Kevin Conroy, Loren Lester, Efrem Zimbalist Jr., Robert Hastings

div.title: Users rated this 8.4/10 (6,412 votes) - click stars to rate

Stars: Daiki Yamashita, Ayane Sakura, Nobuhiko Okamoto, Kaito Ishikawa

div.title: Users rated this 7.8/10 (20,112 votes) - click stars to rate

Stars: Hynden Walch, Scott Menville, Greg Cipes, Khary Payton

div.title: Users rated this 7.3/10 (192,213 votes) - click stars to rate

div.title: Users rated this 5.9/10 (5,693 votes) - click stars to rate

div.title: Users rated this 7.1/10 (4,791 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: The further adventures of the Marvel Universe's mightiest general membership superhero team.
Stars: Roger Craig Smith, Fred Tatasciore, Troy Baker, Travis Willingham

div.title: Users rated this 8.5/10 (29,713 votes) - click stars to rate

div.title: Users rated this 7.1/10 (12,065 votes) - click stars to rate
